scu.prepareDescription: Use actions to prepare spells. Alternatively, you can left/right click on the spell name.
scu.castDescription: Use action to cast a spell. Alternatively, you can click on the spell name.
scu.errorNoActor: You are not owner of any actor. Please contact your GM about this.
scu.errorMultipleActors: You own more than one actor. Please choose an actor on the scene.
scu.errorInvalidActor: '{actor}' is not a PC. Please choose a valid actor!
